item.name: Home
item.description: Rabokki Is My Most Popular Recipe. Hands down, Rabboki is the most popular recipe I’ve ever shared on my Instagram. I dunno—something about the spicy chewy rice cakes combined with ramen noodles make people go crazy for this dish!
